full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL SRAS CHEN PO ZHI BA'I LHA LA NGO MTSAR GTAM BDUN GYI SGO NAS BSTOD PA SKAL BZANG DGA' BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES BDAG NYID CHEN PO RGYAL SRAS ZHI BA'I LHA LA NGO MTSAR DON LDAN GTAM BDUN GYI SGO NAS BSTOD CING GSOL BA BTAB PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA SKAL BZANG DGA' BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS MGON PO 'DI NYID LA DAD GUS BAG TZAM GYIS MTSAMS SBYAR TE RANG GI KHA 'DON DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,) ` LHAG PA'I LHA MNYES N'A LENDRA'I, ,BKOD PA PHUN TSOGS RTZOD PA BZLOG ,YA MTSAN CAN DANG SPRANG PO DANG, ,RGYAL PO MU STEGS BTUL BA STE, ,NGO MTSAR YON TAN BDUN LDAN PA'I, ,SH'AN TA DE PAR GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,BDAG GZHAN MNYAM BRJE'I BYANG CHUB SEMS, ,MYUR DU SKYE BAR BYIN GYIS RLOBS, ,BDAG CHED DKA' SPYOD SPYAD MTHONG TSE, ,SDANG DGRAS MCHI MA SHOR SNYAM PA'I, ,MA RGAN YONGS LA SNYING RJE'I SEMS, ,BCOS MIN SKYE BAR BYIN GYIS RLOBS, ,(ZHES PA'ANG CHOS MING PAS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
